text.text: 陈锡麟　周宁
除了动词和非谓语动词两大类以外，英语语法中的另一难点就是各种从句了。从句中分状语从句、名词性从句、定语从句和强调句等，其要点早见于教科书及各种参考书中。这里从实际运用出发，针对容易混淆的几点略加讨论。
1.某些连接词可用于几种从句，必须善于识别什么类型，这样才不会误解或误用。多用途的连接词尤以that和as最为突出。(as还用作介词。)熟悉下列典型句子很有必要。
The message I took was that Mary would arrive at four o'clock.
It was the message that surprised us all.
He came with the message that Mary would arrive atfour o'clock.
He came with such an exciting message that wecouldn't go to sleep.
That Mary will arive at four'clock is all that Iknow.
We are glad that Mary will arrive soon.
As you are sick,youhad better stay in bed.
As he was reading the letter,tears came to his eyes.
You should do it as you did before.
Tired as he was, he continued working till hefinished it.
Be so good as to help me once again.
He spoke in so loud a voice as to be heardby all.
Tom is really a hard-workin student, asyou will see yourself.
As is known to us all, Dick has won the championship in 100-metredash.
As long as I'm here, I will gladly help you.
As far as we know, that theory has not yet been accpeted by all.
Lincoln is regarded as a national hero in U.S.A.
He works here as a secretarv.
2.某些连接词可分别作两种或两种以上解释，因此给句子的理解会带来麻烦。请看下面这个句子:
Hesaidhewouldletmeknowifhemetwithanytrouble.显然把if解释成“如果”或‘是否”都是合适的。当然这种例子并不很多，但是下列各组句子中连词意义的鉴别就很常用了。Susan has been living here since she was born.(自从)
Susan could only leave sinceshe had no idea of how to solve theproblem.(因为)
As I am very busy, I'll leavethe film tickets to you.(因为)
As I went out of the hall,Iheard my name called.(当……时)
I ran in a hurry so that I couldcatch the last bus.(为的是)
I ran in a hurry so that Icaught the last train.(结果)
3.某些连接词意思相近，而用法不同。从句部分的错误往往就因连词用错而造成。例如:
He was about to leave the roomwhen the telephone rang.(不用while)
When the telephone rang,hewas reading a newapaper.(不用while)
The telephone rang while he wasreading a newspaper.(不用when)
Whether he will be here on time is not certain.(不用if)
I wonder if/whether he will be here on time.
They went to have a look at the house where the hero once worked.(不用which)
He was born in the year when the war broke out.
He was born in the year which you mentioned.(不用when)
I'll trust her no matter what she says to me.
I'll trust whatever she says to me.(不用no matter what)
4.有时句中省略了连接词，给理解带来了困难，尤其是句子较长时更易觉得混乱。例如:I’m sure the girl you mentioned just now will succeed beforelong.
We don’t like the way she talks though webelieve she means good tous.
5.请注意从句和非谓语结构的对应关系，但是也并非从句和非谓语结构均能互换使用，要多加鉴别。
They spoke highly of the bridgethat had been built three monthsbefore.
They spoke highly of the bridgebuilt three months before.
Many people went to visit thetemple which stood at the top of thehill.
Many people went to visit thetemple standing at the top of thehill.
